Dear Heretrix Experts,

I am a Heretrix newbie-- I downloaded Heretrix and=
 maven, but when I
try building, I receive the following error:

$ maven di=
st

[ ... ]

Trying to get missing dependencies (and updated snapshots) req=
uired by
Maven Tasklist Plug-in:
- Attempting to download vdoclet:qdox:curr=
ent:jar from
http://repo1.maven.org/maven
---------------------------------=
----------------------------------------------
>> Unable to obtain goal [di=
st:prepare-bin-filesystem]
>> The build cannot continue because of the foll=
owing unsatisfied
dependency:
- vdoclet:qdox:current:jar

-----------------=
--------------------------------------------------------------
BUILD FAILED=

--------------------------------------------------------------------------=
-----
Total time   : 1 minutes 28 seconds 
Finished at  : Saturday, Februar=
y 7, 2009 4:57:38 PM EST
Final Memory : 7M/32M
----------------------------=
---------------------------------------------------


The build successfull=
y gets through all the junit tests from what I
can tell, but then dies with=
 the above error message.

I was able to locate qdox-current.jar at
http://=
repo1.maven.org/maven2/vdoclet/qdox/current/ (which seems to be
its new loc=
ation), and I saved that jar into maven's lib dir, but I
still get the abov=
e build error.

Any thoughts on what I might be doing wrong?  I am hoping i=
t is
something obvious!

Thanks!

-- Neil
